about_the_game:
Hunters Inc. is a 1-4 player co-op melee FPS featuring rampaging Orc hunters, gigantic monsters to slay and procedurally generated environments teeming with deadly flora and fauna.

1-4 PLAYER CO-OP

Orc Together Strong! Work together as a warband to track your target and bring it down as you fight your way through a savage world full of deadly beasts, lethal hazards and valuable resources!

HUNT GIANT MONSTERS

Hunt down and kill a plethora of creatures that are so powerful they are capable of destroying the environment around them. Each beast presents its own distinct challenge in combat and when killed can be harvested for unique crafting materials.

4 UNIQUE CLASSES

Cut through hordes of enemies as the Berserker, scout ahead and locate your target as the Tracker, harvest natural resources and build war machines as the Blacksmith, or support your team with protective totems and spells as the Shaman.

CRAFTING & PROGRESSION

Harvest defeated monsters for a variety of rare parts! Each monster drops unique carves used to upgrade your gear with the characteristics and attributes of that monster. Earn gold and experience to level up your hunter and unlock access to new weapons and equipment.

PROCEDURALLY GENERATED WORLD

Explore a wild world of procedurally generated locations filled with creatures to hunt and resources to collect. Each mission presents new challenges and no two quests are alike.

  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-3570K 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
